Uses of Interface
zebra4j.AttributeType

Packages that use AttributeType
Package
Description
zebra4j
zebra4j is a generator and solver for Zebra puzzles, a type of "logic grid puzzles".
zebra4j.fact
Definition and implementation of facts.
